titleStmt.title: The Truth of our bad newes from Exeter, sent in a letter, dated May 20. 1643. from a considerable man there, to an eminent merchant in London: and may serve as a confutation of our malignants boasting, who take all advantages to discourage the well-affected party.
titleStmt.author: N. E.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Rothwell, at the Sun in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
